scripts.docker-up: npm run docker-up-account && npm run docker-up-product && npm run docker-up-userapp
scripts.docker-down: npm run docker-down-account && npm run docker-down-product && npm run docker-down-userapp
scripts.cis: npm ci && npm run ci-account && npm run ci-image && npm run ci-product && npm run ci-userapp
scripts.lints: npm run lint-account && npm run lint-image && npm run lint-product && npm run lint-userapp
scripts.tests: npm run test-account && npm run test-image && npm run test-product && npm run test-userapp
scripts.test-userapp: cd UserApp && npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "npm run account" "npm run image" "npm run product" "npm run userapp"
